Paragraph: The skin tests revealed positive delayed reactions of 24 hours and 48 hours by IDR and patch tests to only some PRC with common chains in their structures .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Delayed reactions to IDR (Idiotypic reaction) |
| Delayed reactions to PRC (Phenolic resin compounds) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Delayed reactions to IDR (Idiotypic reaction) |
| Delayed reactions to PRC (Phenolic resin compounds) |

Note: IDR stands for Idiotypic reaction, which is an immune response specific to a particular antigen. It is not a disease itself, but an immune reaction that can be a sign of an underlying disease. Therefore, it is included as a disease entity in this context since it is the focus of the skin tests mentioned in the paragraph.

Paragraph: The skin tests revealed positive delayed reactions of 24 hours and 48 hours by IDR and patch tests to only some PRC with common chains in their structures .

| Chemical |

| IDR |
| PRC with common chains in their structures |

Note: IDR stands for Irritant Dermatitis Reagent. The exact structure of IDR is not mentioned in the paragraph, so it cannot be presented with a specific chemical formula. As for PRC, the paragraph only mentions that they have common chains in their structures, so it is not possible to provide a specific chemical formula for each individual PRC.
